plot: Ralph Staub drops his Screen Snapshots (production number 7859) camera in on NBC's The Judy Canova Radio show, sponsored by Colgate Toothpaste and broadcast on that network from 1944-1953 ...
title: Screen Snapshots Series 25, No. 9: The Judy Canova Radio Show
